message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe holds great value. For this unique opportunity, I am proposing a price of $150. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive guide and a year of free support. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product along with the additional resources. However, I was hoping to find a price closer to $120. I understand if this doesn't work for you, but I wanted to give it a try.
